name: Long Boy Lunge
description:
This game is basically what the tagline says, it's an endless runner that's derivative of Jetpack Joyride. However the game is a bit different in that every time you jump to the ceiling gravity flips to the opposite end of the room, causing your character (the long boy, haha) to alternate gravity every time you press the space bar. You can get points by either gaining distance (and your speed increases as you move) or collecting white spheres. 

SIDE NOTE - If your really confused on the whole long boy thing, just google it. It's really just a dumb meme, you won't get the FBI on your IP address I swear.
